#room_cave_entrance.description: You can feel the sunlight touching your face.

#room_passage_level_1.description:
Passage that is located right after cave entrance.
It gets darker as you go deeper into the cave.

#room_abandoned_campsite.description:
It seems that you are not the first one to discover this cave.
Previous owners left here some of their stuff.

#room_passage_level_2.description: The passage is really dark, you can barely see.

#item_research_documents.description: Documents containing research of the historical artifact 'The Staff of Awakening'.

read.command_show_message:
You have collected clues about the artifact, known as 'Staff of Awakening' from all around the world.
They all lead here, to this cave located far from civilisation.
Rumors say that the staff gives the user a magical ability to control the power of life.
It can drain life of the living and turn the dead into evil soldiers.
You can't let it get into the wrong hands.
Collect the artifact and save the world ... alone.

#item_campsite_tent.description: The tent is covered in a layer of dust. It seems it hasn't been used in a long time.

take.command_show_message: The tent doesn't fit into your bag. You don't need it anyway.

examine.command_show_message:
You take a closer look at the inside of the tent.
There is nobody in there, but you can see a small wooden box in the corner of the tent.

#item_campsite_wooden_box_full.description: A small wooden box. The box is closed and there may be some things inside.

take.command_show_message: The box doesn't fit into your bag. You don't need it anyway.

open.command_show_message: You open the box, revealing the content. You have found a lighter.

#item_campsite_wooden_box_empty.description: A small wooden box. The box is opened and there is nothing inside.

take.command_show_message: The box doesn't fit into your bag. You don't need it anyway.

#item_lighter.description: A portable device used to create a flame.

#item_bottle_of_water.description: A bottle full of refreshing water.
